website_summaries.verdict: A very rugged and large cooler that can keep ice for up to 7 days, although you're better off finding more durable replacements for the hinges and latches.
pros: Available in a variety of sizes and configurations
Threaded drain plug, so you can hook a hose up to it
cons: Hardware seems to be the weak point here, particularly the hinges, which break easily
The latches are also of lower quality

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler for unappreciated moms
customer_reviews.text: Ok...so this was my “mom” cooler. Strictly for me to use and not for my husband or boys to abuse on the boat. It was great while it lasted. Sadly, one day they took it fishing and I wanted to slice them all the same way they sliced up BAIT ON MY BEAUTIFUL COOLER!!! If I could get the same deal I did on this cooler, I’d get it again in a heartbeat. Heck I’d trade a kid for one. It fit perfectly in my large SUV. I’m plotting revenge on their Yeti cooler right now.
customer_reviews.author: cantno

customer_reviews.title: long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler in 1998. Ive used it hundreds of times in the 20 years i had it. camping trips every year. birthday parties. weddings. cookouts. this cooler held up through all of it. it held ice in 90 degree weather at the beach. it marinated whole pigs for pig roasts. it held many cases of beverages for parties. never had any issues whatsoever. it finally gave out this spring. went to pull it and the whole side split. So i laid it to rest and bought another one. This cooler is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler. Weak hinge
customer_reviews.text: Used this cooler for a 2 day camping trip and it did a wonderful job of holding ice and keeping the food cold. 2nd day I thought I may have needed to buy more bags of ice. Not at all. Opened the cooler and sure enough there was still ice from when we left for our trip. Make sure to freeze what foods you can to help prolong this. Works out great I’ve always been a fan of igloo coolers. Oh and for those wondering. The cooler sat outdoors the whole trip. We’d only move it into shade to keep it out of the sun.
customer_reviews.author: BamBamvu

customer_reviews.title: keeps my minnows alive!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ice chest. I turned it into a live minnow tank and added a filtration system to it. I do not know how many cans it will hold or how long it will keep ice because I turned it into a minnow tank. I did order the stainless hinges and put them on. That the hinges can be bought in a 2 pack and this chest takes 3 hinge was a bit strange. This chest would be an excellent cooler and it is really big and needs a lot of room. I would recommend it as a cooler and minnow tank. DMD
customer_reviews.author: dmd

customer_reviews.title: Cooler Review
customer_reviews.text: Large Cooler for camping. It will keep ices for two days at 100 degree temps, but there is a fair amount of melting. We mainly use it for a beverage cooler at the lake. Weakness - cheap hinge/latch to hold the door close, broken by the second weekend. The living hinge is a poor design and inadequate for the designed purpose.. 5 stars knocked down to 4 because of the latch Going to call Igloo and ask for free replacements. Just called them, they are sending two free replacements. Great customer service just bad latch design. IGloo 1800 364 5566 Mon - Fri 8AM - 8PM (Eastern Time) LOCAL: 1-203-922-7500 FAX: 1-203-922-7555
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Large, sturdy, keeps cold!
customer_reviews.text: Its been sooooo HOT in Arizona this Summer 2020. With churches closed due to covid, we wanted to do more than "stay home" so bought this cooler to fill with ice & water bottles & icees and headed to areas filled with homeless people and just handed bottles out...what a blessing this cooler has been! Sturdy, large...when bottles are gone, even the ice is taken!
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Huge Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Cooler is huge and can hold a lot of food and drinks as well as ice. Problem is the ice doesn’t stay solid and melts. I went on a camping trip in October for 5 days. After the first day the ice started to melt and was basically completely gone on the third day. This wouldn’t be a problem if it wasn’t advertised to last 7. Also, the clips to keep the cooler closed are very bad quality. If you need something for size this is the cooler to go with but if you’re looking for cold I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent job of keeping ice and holds a lot of fish. If you use it on a boat, be sure that it faces the stern, so the wind doesn't catch the lid (this is probably obvious to everyone in the world, but don't ask me how I know this). I would have liked to see a more substantial retainer strap (that keeps the lid from opening too far) and sturdier hinges, but then again, that would increase the cost. So, all in all, a good balance of utility vs. economy.
customer_reviews.author: Dmaniac278

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law uses this for hunting, to place the meat in to keep it cool. It works great and is a nice size for deer and elk. The closing tabs seem a little flimsy but I read reviews and they said that Igloo would replace them if they break.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Fan

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT keep ice for 7 days at 90 degrees Fahrenheit
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT keep ice for 7 days at 90 degrees Fahrenheit. Barely keeps 20 lbs for 24 hours. I spent as much for the ice in 10 days as I did for the cooler. The cooler was in the shade under the canopy and it was not 90 degrees it only got up to 87 degrees for a day and the nights when down to 64 degrees this is the Adirondacks so it does get cool here at night. Not at all happy with the purchase. This is the first time I've ever written a review, that is how disappointed I was with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Photos Are Inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: Product photos are inaccurate, the photo of the interior clearly shows dividers, the product shipped did not have them. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk T.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, huge, good quality
customer_reviews.text: We got this to store our apple harvest from our 6 trees, it holds a lot, and we should have bought it years earlier. Great chest, about 4 feet long, fits in an unused bathtub with ice packs. Drains easily.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cold
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a trip to Maine didn’t expect to be as good as they said but it surpassed all expectations for me. Bringing meat back for a 16 hour drive packed with 4 bags of ice meat and lobster were frozen and the ice barely melted at all after the second day when we unloaded the trailer and coolers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for memorial day weekend why I was camping. It kept everything cool for the 3 days why I was camping. Has plenty of room for food and drinks. Still had ice Monday morning before we left. I used two 20 pound bags of ice and dumped my ice out of my frezzer in it. I purchased the 150qt cooler for 100 and would do it again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Down
customer_reviews.text: It strikes me as almost unbelievable that Igloo would equip this cooler with cheap flimsy plastic hardware that will break sooner rather than later. Of course then a person has to spend over $50.00 to replace the latches and hinges. A cooler that costs $115.00 should be equipped with sturdy hardware not junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. High quality all they way. The picture doesn't show that there is a small hatch on top...which to me is a plus. This cooler is solid built. It is better quality than the equivalent coleman cooler from w-mart....I own both. Another big plus is that this cooler allows you to screw on a water hose for easier drainage away from camp or car. That makes this cooler very convenient given the size. If you raise and butcher your own cows, then don't hesitate to get some of these. This size allows you to layer the ice properly.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Liked it's availability vs the 124 qt cooler. The 150 arrived in two days vs 24 day wait for the 124qt. I use it on the stern deck of my boat for cooling food, drink or caught fish. Not at the same time of course.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES FRENCH DICKEY

customer_reviews.title: Love Igloo
customer_reviews.text: We have been fans of Igloo for years. Ice will stay for many days even in the heat. This one is nice where it has the access door on top to save from opening the lid. I did buy some replacement latches but we've had this for some time now and the plasic latches are still good as new!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kremer

customer_reviews.title: 38.5" long externally.  35.5" long internally.  Not 43 inches as described in the specs.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but it does not match the dimensions listed. It is actually only 35.5 inches long internally and 38.5 inches long externally. Looks like a great product, but it will not hold the item I need it for. I suggest they correct the dimensions. I called Igloo about this. They agree with my measurements. They actually do not sell a cooler longer than 38.5 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Bullweezer

customer_reviews.title: does not hold ice long
customer_reviews.text: does not work as decribed. hold ice for about a day and half depending on temps not 3 days like it should
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Fasnacht

customer_reviews.title: Best large size cooler to bang around & use!
customer_reviews.text: Best large size cooler out there IMO! It's durable, the handles don't break off easily, and it really does keep things cold for a long time when sittin out in heat! Can't complain for the price & quality you get from an Igloo.
customer_reviews.author: KeepCalmDabOn

customer_reviews.title: Broke on day 1 of first use.
customer_reviews.text: Internal straps broke upon first use. Hinges were snapped on arrival. Donated to homeless shelter with money for metal fixtures. Igloo has gone way down since being bought out.
customer_reviews.author: John E.

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 4th of July picnic. Held lots of beer and kept it cold. Kids sat on it to watch fireworks. It’s big!
customer_reviews.author: Cakecol

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler, lightweight and durable. Used it to go out west and bring home some frozen game. It kept everything frozen solid for 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Hilwar

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler, crappy Hinges, Crappy plastic drain outlet. Broke on 1st use.
customer_reviews.text: One my 1st use for Hurricane Erica, I packed 40lbs of ice into this. It kept for 7 days. *** But the outlet cover was broken, I didn't notice this until I check 6 days later and there was no water...It had slowly leaked all over my floor. Now I have to try and find this part.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR OUTDOOR PARTIES
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 3.5 if I could but better than a 3. So far, so good! Great size for our outdoor parties and holidays when we have many guests on not enough frig space for all the beverages. Only concerns is what others have expressed . . . the hinges do not look like they will hold up to much use.Also although the there is a a separate opening to save the "cold", it's not very practical if what you are looking for is at the other end of the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Cornish

customer_reviews.title: Great for weekend trips.
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Holds a bunch of cans, bottles, food or whatever you want to put in it. Cubed ice will only last 2-3 days in it. Don't expect more than that. Use blocks of ice, they'll last longer.
customer_reviews.author: B1960

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our cooler from Costco that the lid blew off of on the way home from a fishing trip. Great quality, maybe a little more expensive than the one we bought at Costco years ago, but this isn't the season to get them at Costco and this price beat the stores we looked at.
customer_reviews.author: DS longtime reader

customer_reviews.title: Weak handle
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased about 8 of these coolers during the last 10 years, used primarily at Farmers Markets. I've noticed a reduction in quality. I recently purchased 2 more coolers and after 3 uses the handle on one of the coolers separated away from the body of the cooler itself. I can no longer pull the filled cooler by the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Schoch

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity for long trips
customer_reviews.text: The latches on the cooler are marginal. I used the cooler on a 3400 mile trip. Added ice daily. At a family reunion it held ice and kept things very cold for three days
customer_reviews.author: Michael Penman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooler
customer_reviews.text: We took a couple of hundred pounds of frozen meat from Kentucky to Texas, which with an overnight hotel stop, meant the meat was in the cooler for about 26 hours. We didn't add ice or anything, and just opened it very briefly when we woke up to check on it. All of the meat was still frozen solid when we arrived at our destination. I am sure we could have gone another 24 hours without any worries. We were really impressed, and this is definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: BenMama

customer_reviews.title: Its only 110 quarts!
customer_reviews.text: My new igloo cooler just came today so I can't speak to its performance yet. It is a very nice cooler for the money with an extendable handle, steel hinges and large wheels, nothing like the picture. Being an Igloo I'm sure it will hold ice fine. But... It is clearly sold as 150 quarts and it is only 110 quarts. Maybe Amazon sent the wrong item??
customer_reviews.author: Tony  S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Big
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is great and for a great price on Amazon. I bought it to transport meat after hunting. I am able to fit two quartered deer in this cooler, no problem. You can then throw up to 5 bags of ice on top and your meat will be good to go for a couple of days. Ice stayed frozen for about 4-5 days in 65 degree weather. I would definitely recommend this cooler to any outdoorsman.
customer_reviews.author: RBG 3

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler for bbqs holds a ton and lots of ice stayed cold for a few days
customer_reviews.author: dsjmac

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: You can fit alot of pop in these and they stay cold a very long time. They worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good and made in US
customer_reviews.text: Honestly? We bought it to cool carcasses after butchering. Held a cool temp, didn't allow ice to melt, has a nice large interior and is a good sturdy cooler. We really like it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: perfect for car camping
customer_reviews.text: love this cooler just be ready to buy or use 6-10 bags of ice with some dry ice to get the best results for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L Martins

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 Horrible quality! Thin plastic hindges attached with screws. 2 of the holes were stripped. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: HUGE refreshment cooler
customer_reviews.text: Holds so much refreshment, you may only need this 1 cooler. The small door on top helps keep the cold inside, especially when there are a bunch of kids wanting to grab some ice cubes. I highly recommend adding the replacement stainless stem hinges and latches. This thing should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Subie

customer_reviews.title: Six
customer_reviews.text: I put 1 bag of ice in the cooler and the inside of the cooler now has a crack in it. Not very happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: matthew t sturm

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Food COLD
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this cooler for storing fish after he caught them on his boat. He ended up purchasing the stainless steel hardware for it and it works great! There is an easy access port on the top that will allow water in, but won't let the cold out. It is easy to clean and drain and keeps food cold for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: Daddy's Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: We are hardcore boaters and a few years ago found the 120 quart coolers at BJ's on sale for some ridiculous amount and bought a couple of them, but when we headed back to pick one up for my dad they were gone. Its always a challenge buying for him for Christmas so this year I remembered that he never got one of the big coolers. He was so excited and now he has the biggest one on the dock!!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: ... doesn't have a lot of insulation so not as good as holding ice as other coolers I have used ...
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and doesn't have a lot of insulation so not as good as holding ice as other coolers I have used in its class.
customer_reviews.author: George Steele

customer_reviews.title: Really Great product for a Great price
customer_reviews.text: Really big cooler. It held a 50-lb pig for 3 days and stayed cool with only 3 bags of ice. I can't wait to fill it with 100 beers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Danielson

customer_reviews.title: holy crap this thing keeps ice
customer_reviews.text: holy crap this thing keeps ice. I did a test and ice and little water by the 2nd day. planning to use this for a big event to store all our food we cook. The fact i can upgrade to stainless exterior parts makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Lurvuc

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After two months the latches on the coolers broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Arslan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchase was easy, product was as described and arrived in great condition! would purchase from again.
customer_reviews.author: Xan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Keeps drinks cold for like 3 to 5 days on 4 bags of ice. I put like 6 or 7 12 packs of sodas. Just keep the lid closed as much as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this twice, the hinge tore and the lid ripped off. I have 2 other Igloo coolers, similar but not the same. This one is far less quality than the others I have. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda M Zeller

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: 5 x 10lbs block ice + 144 12oz. soda cans and 25lbs. coktail ice . Absolutely incredible! Lasted over a week. Bought the stainless hinges and latches when we got home. Handles held up great under pressure. I am 220lbs. and I stood on this cooler without fear.Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: alan bryan

customer_reviews.title: Poor hinges
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was great and the cooler is large but the hinges are the weakest part of this cooler. They have broken in less than 5 months including the extension strap.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Horine

customer_reviews.title: If you are going to use it for camping I recommend that you buy some shelves to keep your food ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really big ice chest. If you are going to use it for camping I recommend that you buy some shelves to keep your food and ice separate.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Evans

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great to keep everything cold for my party
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler but you will need to replace the clasps that lock it closed.
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler but you will have to replace the clasps within a year. For this price they should have included the more rugged clips.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love the access door on top
customer_reviews.text: the right size for a large family. Love the access door on top, makes sense. The only thing missing, is the old plastic tray that holds meats and cheeses.
customer_reviews.author: domenic

customer_reviews.title: Plastic parts fail
customer_reviews.text: Plastic hinges, plastic strap that is held to the inside of the cooler by a small screw. We used the cooler two times. The screw pulled out of the side while the lid was opened, ripping the plastic on the inside of the cooler, exposing the foam insulation.
customer_reviews.author: libertyinmo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Use it to transport anything I like to keep cold in quantity.
customer_reviews.author: George D. Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cooler!!! Works great but extremely heavy when full. Kept things cold for 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Deltybfin

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler. We have a couple of these. Perfect size and keeps things cold for a few days with ice. GREAT PRICE most importantly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my honey to go fishing with it’s so big I could fit inside, he loves it
customer_reviews.author: D'Marie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everyone seems alright, mine just had a small dent in the top.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler but the latches
customer_reviews.text: Nice cooler but the latches, hinges and lid strap are plastic. I swapped out the hinges and latches based on online comments. For the price, the hinges and latches should be higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rod_Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Use
customer_reviews.text: I got this to provide safe shelter for a feral cat in my back yard. The hatch works perfectly (with the cooler on its side) to provide access. We just had a terrible sold snap and the cat did just fine in this cooler-as-shelter. Price wise it is on a par with purpose-made solutions, and seems to be better made. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shipley

customer_reviews.title: This is a huge cooler!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler really does keep the ice longer than the average cooler. I am impressed on how long the ice last in it. The hinges look like like the maybe a problem, but time will tell. Either way they are available on amazon which also makes me think that..
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kosaski

customer_reviews.title: The capacity is great and the extra door on the top allows for ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't think that it would be big enough.......but it was huge! I bought this for my church so we could have a way of keeping drinks cold when we have outside activities and it did the job. It even kept ice and drinks for up to an additional three days after our event. The capacity is great and the extra door on the top allows for easy access to the contents without losing the cool by opening the entire door. I absolutely love this igloo!!!!! GREAT FIND for the price. Now I want another.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is totally what we wanted! We process our own meat, and we needed something large enough to put the cut up pieces in to cool down and to soak out all the blood. THIS IS PERFECT! So glad we found it!~
customer_reviews.author: Gloria E. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of space for very cheap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooler for my camping trip, ($73). It held everything and more. I never once ran out fo space for my food, drink, and beer. I read others review on this cooler and noticed the same problem. Cheap Handles! do not over fill this cooler while carrying. I filled the cooler half-way with food and ice only and carried it to my camp spot, I then proceeded to fill the cooler with drinks and beer. Other then that this is an amazing cooler. Quality: 9/10 - Cheap Handles Price: 10/10 - Cannot find a 150-Quart cooler under $100 Selection: 0/10 - Only comes in white, Not a big issue for me
customer_reviews.author: Rafael T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although one of the back closure flaps was broken, the cooler is worth the money spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Hickenbottom

customer_reviews.title: Great size and keeps things cold
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one of these. They work so good people tend to borrow it and never give it back. You can fit a lot in the cooler. And it keeps everything ice cold.
customer_reviews.author: Dina M. Nicodemus

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things cold for days
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this cooler. It keeps food and drinks cold for like a week and is great for parties and traveling. It's definitely big, but heavy duty and durable.
customer_reviews.author: NJMichelle

customer_reviews.title: Great size. I do agree with other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Great size. I do agree with other reviews... The lock hinge is not that great, but the cooler itself is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: Igloo cooler 150 qt
customer_reviews.text: Cooler came in excellent condition. All parts work well and looks great. We are very pleased with the cooler. We intend to use it for hunting and place our meat that has been "harvested". Researching, order and receiving the product was very easy and "painless" and got an excellent price and value.
customer_reviews.author: LILIA RAMOS

customer_reviews.title: Good ice chest for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a good medium ice chest. The only reason I did not give it five stars is the top is not insulated. The handles are sturdy enough to carry it full though it would take two linebackers to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Skytx

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for better quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for better quality for the price. I am using this as a cigar humidor. It has a perfect seal and maintains humidity very well! And it's HUGE! Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: jharrisx5

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cooler is great if it weren't for those plastic lid fasteners that keep breaking.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping big items cold.
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Very large, your able to fit 2 full grown bodies in this cooler with ease, 3 if you chop them up. Will also keep whatever it is you are hauling cold for 2 days without refiling the ice. The latches do break but the cooler will still make a seal without them. You will need 2 people to carry this thing when full trust me it can get quite heavy. Good news is there is plenty of room in the cooler for that second body when done.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: ... damaged in shipping but it would have been a great cooler. Well made
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the cooler as it was damaged in shipping but it would have been a great cooler. Well made, sturdy, probably one of the better coolers on the market for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Looks like good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks like good quality. I bought this along with the steel hinges and latch because I know the plastic ones will brake easily. It was a great price and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: but lid warped and is useless now.
customer_reviews.text: Used the cooler on a camping trip. Mid 90 temps. Cooler seemed to keep ice well. Had a Coleman Xtreme that I think kept ice longer, but lid warped and is useless now.
customer_reviews.author: DRad

customer_reviews.title: solid cooler at the best price
customer_reviews.text: Solidly build. Nice access flap for grabbing a quick soda. The whole surface is easy clean. It was the most economic 150 qt 5 cubic foot cooler I could find.
customer_reviews.author: R. Custer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it! it looked like it would be longer but it severed its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: angel batista

customer_reviews.title: cooler
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these coolers and now have bought these two more. It is exactly what I wanted and they are great. The handles will pull out if you are trying to carry heavy stuff so beware.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Thomas

customer_reviews.title: lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was incredibly fast! Love all the extra room and the small access door is a good idea. Latches broke on the 120 Qt one that this is replacing and I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.  Got it quickly when I needed it in a pinch.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the expediency of receiving this item. Durable and well-insulated. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Raith

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold but it HEAVY!
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that would have made it better are wheels. This thing is HEAVY when loaded. Otherwise works great and stays very cold.
customer_reviews.author: Clintonics

customer_reviews.title: Super Cooler
customer_reviews.text: What a deal! The price and free shipping (Prime) was the best deal ever. The small opening on the lid is perfect for getting out what you need without opening up the whole cooler.
customer_reviews.author: C.I.A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is the best. Still had ice after four days, still cold after 5.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Hold 1/2 a bison
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not I got a half bison for Christmas. Had to pick it up several hours away and needed the room to store it. Keep everything cold and seems great for keeping anything else cold for parties or float trips.
customer_reviews.author: BKWohls

customer_reviews.title: Other then that good igloo.
customer_reviews.text: The first day camping the latch broke came right off now I have to order new metal ones cuz the plastic ones or not strong snuff. Other then that good igloo.
customer_reviews.author: AGG

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I looked a Costco, Target and the all time dreaded Walmart for this cooler, it is fantastic for picnics and daily use. I could not find a better price than Amazon,
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Once we received it we understood why others ...
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is huge. Perfect! Once we received it we understood why others suggested to purchase more substantial hinges. But LOVE the cooler!
customer_reviews.author: L. M-B.

customer_reviews.title: This cooler could probably fit a couple of bodies into ...
customer_reviews.text: This cooler could probably fit a couple of bodies into it if you cut them up just right.... I'm talking about duck and goose bodies by the way you fruitcake.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler for family fun, fishing trips and weekend bbq.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler---but buy the upgraded hardware
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler! Held ice for 4 days in 85-90 temps----was impressed! Easy to drain and cleaned well. I recommend buying the hardward upgrades---metal hinges and clasps.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Went camping on a Wednsday with a full cooler [bottles ...
customer_reviews.text: Went camping on a Wednsday with a full cooler [bottles, cans,and groceries] lots. Came home Sunday night and emptied it,still had quite a bit of ice left. temp. was in the 90s all weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot, has a drain that accepts a garden hose
customer_reviews.author: Penny Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This ice chest is very big and made to last. It is industrial strength made. My seal of approval
customer_reviews.author: jwa

customer_reviews.title: Great Big Cooler!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Definitely a must have and it holds a ton of ice and keeps it cold!
customer_reviews.author: ColeFL

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is amazing for the price! Keeps ice for days!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, the item seems made well and seems to function properly. I will get some use out of it and if I have any problems I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: J Rickman

product_meta.title: Igloo Quick and Cool
feature_bullets: Ultratherm insulated body and lid keep ice for 7 days at 90 degrees Fahrenheit
Quick-access hatch lets you access contents without letting the cold air escape
Reinforced swing-up handles with tie-down loop feature
Dual snap-fit latches secure lid closure. Stain and odor resistant liner keeps beverages and food fresh
Threaded drain plug for hose hook up and easy draining.Tougher stains may be cleaned with diluted solution of baking soda and water
Exterior Dimensions ( L x W x H ): 41.63 inches x 18.69 inches x 20.25 inches
